scene: Raccoon standing in front of a magnificent Byzantine Orthodox church with golden domes, mosaic art visible through the open doors, warm golden light streaming out, the raccoon has arms open in a welcoming gesture, a few lit candles on either side of the entrance, autumn leaves floating gently

Raccoon inside an ornate Orthodox sanctuary holding a golden censer with wisps of incense smoke, Byzantine icons with gold leaf backgrounds on the walls, soft candlelight illumination, mosaic floor, arched ceiling with painted saints

Raccoon dancing exuberantly at a Greek festival, blue and white decorations everywhere, string lights overhead, plates of baklava and gyros on tables, other small raccoons clapping in the background, festive Mediterranean atmosphere
